title: Delayed Material Delivery
description: Potential delay in delivery of construction materials due to supply chain disruptions
mitigationPlan: Identify alternative suppliers and maintain buffer stock

title: Budget Overrun
description: Risk of exceeding allocated budget due to rising material costs
mitigationPlan: Regular budget reviews and cost optimization measures

title: Monsoon Impact
description: Heavy monsoon rains may delay construction activities
mitigationPlan: Schedule critical activities outside monsoon season

title: Labor Shortage
description: Shortage of skilled labor during peak construction period

title: Regulatory Approval Delays
description: Delays in obtaining necessary regulatory approvals

title: Technical Design Changes
description: Potential need for design modifications based on site conditions
mitigationPlan: Comprehensive site surveys before finalizing designs

title: Equipment Breakdown
description: Risk of critical equipment failure causing project delays
mitigationPlan: Regular maintenance schedules and backup equipment

title: Quality Non-Compliance
description: Risk of quality standards not being met
mitigationPlan: Strict quality control measures and regular inspections
